Underhill 37 * Contact: john.underhill@protonmail.com 38 */ 39 40 41 #ifndef QSC_NTRU_H 42 #define QSC_NTRU_H 43 71 72 #include "common.h" 73 #include "ntrubase.h" 74 //#endif 75 76 #if defined(QSC_NTRU_S1HPS2048509) 77 82 # define QSC_NTRU_CIPHERTEXT_SIZE 699 83 88 # define QSC_NTRU_PRIVATEKEY_SIZE 935 89 94 # define QSC_NTRU_PUBLICKEY_SIZE 699 95 96 #elif defined(QSC_NTRU_S3HPS2048677) 97 102 # define QSC_NTRU_CIPHERTEXT_SIZE 930 103 108 # define QSC_NTRU_PRIVATEKEY_SIZE 1234 109 114 # define QSC_NTRU_PUBLICKEY_SIZE 930 115 116 #elif defined(QSC_NTRU_S5HPS4096821) 117 122 # define QSC_NTRU_CIPHERTEXT_SIZE 1230 123 128 # define QSC_NTRU_PRIVATEKEY_SIZE 1590 129 134 # define QSC_NTRU_PUBLICKEY_SIZE 1230 135 136 #elif defined(QSC_NTRU_S5HRSS701) 137 142 # define QSC_NTRU_CIPHERTEXT_SIZE 1138 143 148 # define QSC_NTRU_PRIVATEKEY_SIZE 1450 149 154 # define QSC_NTRU_PUBLICKEY_SIZE 1138 155 156 #else 157 # error "The NTRU parameter set is invalid!" 158 #endif 159 164 #define QSC_NTRU_SEED_SIZE 32 165 170 #define QSC_NTRU_SHAREDSECRET_SIZE 32 171 176 #define QSC_NTRU_ALGNAME "NTRU" 177 186 QSC_EXPORT_API bool qsc_ntru_decapsulate(uint8_t* secret, const uint8_t* ciphertext, const uint8_t* privatekey); 187 197 QSC_EXPORT_API bool qsc_ntru_decrypt(uint8_t* secret, const uint8_t* ciphertext, const uint8_t* privatekey); 198 209 QSC_EXPORT_API void qsc_ntru_encapsulate(uint8_t* secret, uint8_t* ciphertext, const uint8_t* publickey, bool (*rng_generate)(uint8_t*, size_t)); 210 222 QSC_EXPORT_API void qsc_ntru_encrypt(uint8_t* secret, uint8_t* ciphertext, const uint8_t* publickey, const uint8_t seed[QSC_NTRU_SEED_SIZE]); 223 233 QSC_EXPORT_API void qsc_ntru_generate_keypair(uint8_t* publickey, uint8_t* privatekey, bool (*rng_generate)(uint8_t*, size_t)); 234 235 #endif
